alert.note: Alert for Okanogan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 3:53PM PDT until May 21 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Okanogan County in north central Washington... * Until 445 PM PDT. * At 352 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Nespelem Community, or 16 miles southeast of Omak, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Disautel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
